Setting Chassis Policy

To select chassis policy, perform the following:

 1. The chassis discovery policy determines how the system reacts when you add a new chassis. Cisco UCS Manager uses the Action value in the chassis discovery policy to determine the minimum threshold for the number of links between the chassis and the fabric interconnect.

 2. Link Aggregation Policy determines whether to group links from the IOM to the fabric interconnect in a fabric port channel or not.

Figure 4-1 Chassis Policy
